statements: SELECT * FROM SecurityThreatData WHERE threat_id = 1;
SELECT threat_type, threat_severity FROM SecurityThreatData WHERE threat_severity > 4;
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM SecurityThreatData;
SELECT MAX(threat_severity) FROM SecurityThreatData;
SELECT MIN(threat_severity) FROM SecurityThreatData;
SELECT AVG(threat_severity) FROM SecurityThreatData;
SELECT DISTINCT threat_type FROM SecurityThreatData;
SELECT * FROM SecurityThreatData WHERE threat_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM SecurityThreatData WHERE threat_description LIKE '%malware%';
SELECT threat_id, COUNT(*) FROM SecurityThreatData GROUP BY threat_id;
SELECT * FROM SecurityThreatData ORDER BY threat_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM SecurityThreatData WHERE threat_severity BETWEEN 2 AND 4;
SELECT AVG(threat_severity) AS average_severity FROM SecurityThreatData GROUP BY threat_type;
SELECT * FROM SecurityThreatData WHERE threat_type = 'DDoS';
SELECT threat_date, DATE_FORMAT(threat_date, '%Y-%m-%d') AS formatted_date FROM SecurityThreatData;
SELECT DAY(threat_date) AS day_of_month, COUNT(*) FROM SecurityThreatData GROUP BY day_of_month;
SELECT YEAR(threat_date) AS year, MONTH(threat_date) AS month, COUNT(*) FROM SecurityThreatData GROUP BY year, month;
SELECT * FROM SecurityThreatData WHERE MONTH(threat_date) = 10;
SELECT DISTINCT YEAR(threat_date) AS year FROM SecurityThreatData ORDER BY year;
SELECT * FROM SecurityThreatData WHERE YEAR(threat_date) = 2022;
SELECT * FROM SecurityThreatData WHERE threat_severity > 5;
SELECT threat_id, threat_type, threat_severity FROM SecurityThreatData WHERE threat_severity >= 7;
SELECT threat_id, threat_type, threat_description FROM SecurityThreatData WHERE threat_type = 'Malware';
SELECT * FROM SecurityThreatData WHERE threat_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM SecurityThreatData WHERE threat_severity = 10;
SELECT MAX(threat_severity) FROM SecurityThreatData;
SELECT MIN(threat_severity) FROM SecurityThreatData WHERE threat_type = 'Ransomware';
SELECT AVG(threat_severity) FROM SecurityThreatData WHERE threat_type = 'Phishing';
SELECT DISTINCT threat_type FROM SecurityThreatData;
SELECT threat_id, threat_description FROM SecurityThreatData WHERE threat_severity > 8 ORDER BY threat_date DESC;
SELECT AVG(threat_severity) AS avg_severity, COUNT(threat_id) AS threat_count FROM SecurityThreatData GROUP BY threat_type;
SELECT * FROM SecurityThreatData WHERE threat_date >= '2022-01-01' AND threat_date < '2023-01-01' ORDER BY threat_severity DESC;
SELECT threat_type, COUNT(*), AVG(threat_severity) FROM SecurityThreatData GROUP BY threat_type HAVING AVG(threat_severity) > 5;
SELECT * FROM SecurityThreatData WHERE threat_description LIKE '%vulnerability%';
SELECT threat_id, threat_type, DATE_FORMAT(threat_date, '%Y-%m-%d') AS threat_date_formatted FROM SecurityThreatData;
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT threat_type) FROM SecurityThreatData;
SELECT SUM(threat_severity) FROM SecurityThreatData;
SELECT * FROM SecurityThreatData WHERE YEAR(threat_date) = 2021;
SELECT threat_type, COUNT(*) AS total_count FROM SecurityThreatData GROUP BY threat_type ORDER BY total_count DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT threat_id, threat_type, threat_description FROM SecurityThreatData WHERE threat_description IS NOT NULL ORDER BY RAND() LIMIT 1;
SELECT * FROM threats;
SELECT threat_name, threat_description FROM threats;
SELECT threat_name, threat_level FROM threats WHERE threat_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM mitigation_strategies;
SELECT strategy_name, strategy_description FROM mitigation_strategies;
SELECT strategy_name, threat_name FROM mitigation_strategies JOIN threats ON mitigation_strategies.threat_id = threats.threat_id;
SELECT strategy_name, threat_name FROM mitigation_strategies LEFT JOIN threats ON mitigation_strategies.threat_id = threats.threat_id;
SELECT threat_name, strategy_name FROM threats JOIN mitigation_strategies ON threats.threat_id = mitigation_strategies.threat_id;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS num_threats FROM threats;
SELECT AVG(threat_level) AS avg_threat_level FROM threats;
SELECT MAX(threat_level) AS max_threat_level FROM threats;
SELECT MIN(threat_level) AS min_threat_level FROM threats;
SELECT threat_name, strategy_name FROM threats, mitigation_strategies WHERE threats.threat_id = mitigation_strategies.threat_id;
SELECT threat_name FROM threats WHERE threat_level > 5;
SELECT threat_name FROM threats WHERE threat_level BETWEEN 3 AND 7;
SELECT threat_name FROM threats WHERE threat_description LIKE '%vulnerability%';
SELECT threat_name FROM threats WHERE threat_description IS NOT NULL;
SELECT threat_name, COUNT(*) AS num_strategies FROM threats JOIN mitigation_strategies ON threats.threat_id = mitigation_strategies.threat_id GROUP BY threat_name;
SELECT threat_name, AVG(strategy_id) AS avg_strategy_id FROM threats JOIN mitigation_strategies ON threats.threat_id = mitigation_strategies.threat_id GROUP BY threat_name;
SELECT threat_name, strategy_name FROM threats JOIN mitigation_strategies ON threats.threat_id = mitigation_strategies.threat_id ORDER BY threat_name DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM threats WHERE threat_id = 1;
SELECT threat_name, threat_level FROM threats WHERE threat_level > 2;
SELECT threat_name, strategy_name FROM threats t JOIN mitigation_strategies m ON t.threat_id = m.threat_id;
SELECT t.threat_name, m.strategy_name FROM threats t JOIN mitigation_strategies m ON t.threat_id = m.threat_id WHERE t.threat_level > 3;
SELECT t.threat_id, t.threat_name, m.strategy_name FROM threats t LEFT JOIN mitigation_strategies m ON t.threat_id = m.threat_id;
SELECT t.threat_id, t.threat_name, m.strategy_name FROM threats t RIGHT JOIN mitigation_strategies m ON t.threat_id = m.threat_id;
SELECT t.threat_name, m.strategy_name FROM threats t INNER JOIN mitigation_strategies m ON t.threat_id = m.threat_id;
SELECT t.threat_name, m.strategy_name FROM threats t LEFT JOIN mitigation_strategies m ON t.threat_id = m.threat_id WHERE m.strategy_id > 5;
SELECT t.threat_name, m.strategy_name FROM threats t LEFT JOIN mitigation_strategies m ON t.threat_id = m.threat_id ORDER BY t.threat_name ASC;
SELECT t.threat_name, m.strategy_name FROM threats t LEFT JOIN mitigation_strategies m ON t.threat_id = m.threat_id ORDER BY m.strategy_name DESC;
SELECT t.threat_name, m.strategy_name FROM threats t LEFT JOIN mitigation_strategies m ON t.threat_id = m.threat_id WHERE t.threat_level < 4 ORDER BY t.threat_name ASC, m.strategy_name DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS num_threats FROM threats;
SELECT AVG(threat_level) AS avg_threat_level FROM threats;
SELECT t.threat_name, COUNT(m.strategy_id) AS num_strategies FROM threats t LEFT JOIN mitigation_strategies m ON t.threat_id = m.threat_id GROUP BY t.threat_name;
SELECT t.threat_name, AVG(m.strategy_id) AS avg_strategy_id FROM threats t LEFT JOIN mitigation_strategies m ON t.threat_id = m.threat_id GROUP BY t.threat_name;
SELECT t.threat_name, MAX(m.strategy_id) AS max_strategy_id FROM threats t LEFT JOIN mitigation_strategies m ON t.threat_id = m.threat_id GROUP BY t.threat_name;
SELECT t.threat_name, MIN(m.strategy_id) AS min_strategy_id FROM threats t LEFT JOIN mitigation_strategies m ON t.threat_id = m.threat_id GROUP BY t.threat_name;
SELECT t.threat_id, SUM(t.threat_level) AS total_threat_level FROM threats t;
SELECT t.threat_name, SUM(m.strategy_id) AS total_strategy_id FROM threats t LEFT JOIN mitigation_strategies m ON t.threat_id = m.threat_id;
SELECT AVG(t.threat_level) AS avg_threat_level, AVG(m.strategy_id) AS avg_strategy_id FROM threats t LEFT JOIN mitigation_strategies m ON t.threat_id = m.threat_id;
SELECT * FROM threat_data;
SELECT threat_id, threat_name FROM threat_data;
SELECT threat_name, threat_level FROM threat_data;
SELECT * FROM affected_systems;
SELECT system_id, system_name FROM affected_systems;
SELECT system_type FROM affected_systems;
SELECT * FROM defense_measures;
SELECT measure_id, measure_name FROM defense_measures;
SELECT measure_description FROM defense_measures;
SELECT threat_name, system_name FROM threat_data, affected_systems WHERE threat_data.threat_id = affected_systems.threat_id;
SELECT * FROM threat_data WHERE threat_level = 3;
SELECT system_name, measure_name FROM affected_systems, defense_measures WHERE affected_systems.system_id = defense_measures.system_id;
SELECT * FROM threat_data ORDER BY threat_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM affected_systems ORDER BY system_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM defense_measures WHERE threat_id = 1;
SELECT AVG(threat_level) AS avg_threat_level FROM threat_data;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS num_threats FROM threat_data;
SELECT MAX(threat_level) AS max_threat_level FROM threat_data;
SELECT MIN(threat_level) AS min_threat_level FROM threat_data;
SELECT DISTINCT system_type FROM affected_systems;

SELECT threat_name, COUNT(*) AS num_associated_measures FROM threat_data, defense_measures WHERE threat_data.threat_id = defense_measures.threat_id GROUP BY threat_name HAVING num_associated_measures > 1;
SELECT * FROM threat_data;
SELECT threat_id, threat_name FROM threat_data WHERE threat_level > 5;
SELECT system_name, system_type FROM affected_systems WHERE system_type = 'Firewall';
SELECT measure_name, measure_description FROM defense_measures WHERE measure_id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT * FROM threat_data JOIN affected_systems ON threat_data.threat_id = affected_systems.threat_id;
SELECT threat_name, system_name FROM threat_data JOIN affected_systems ON threat_data.threat_id = affected_systems.threat_id WHERE system_type = 'Server';
SELECT * FROM threat_data JOIN defense_measures ON threat_data.threat_id = defense_measures.threat_id JOIN affected_systems ON defense_measures.system_id = affected_systems.system_id;
SELECT threat_name, measure_name FROM threat_data JOIN defense_measures ON threat_data.threat_id = defense_measures.threat_id WHERE defense_measures.measure_id = 1;
SELECT system_name, measure_name FROM affected_systems JOIN defense_measures ON affected_systems.system_id = defense_measures.system_id WHERE affected_systems.system_type = 'Desktop';
SELECT * FROM threat_data WHERE threat_id < 10;
SELECT * FROM threat_data WHERE threat_id BETWEEN 5 AND 15;
SELECT * FROM threat_data WHERE threat_description LIKE '%phishing%';
SELECT system_name, measure_name FROM affected_systems JOIN defense_measures ON affected_systems.system_id = defense_measures.system_id WHERE measure_name LIKE '%firewall%';
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM threat_data;
SELECT AVG(threat_level) FROM threat_data;
SELECT MAX(threat_level) FROM threat_data;
SELECT MIN(threat_level) FROM threat_data;
SELECT SUM(threat_level) FROM threat_data;
SELECT threat_name, COUNT(*) AS total FROM threat_data GROUP BY threat_name HAVING total > 1;
SELECT * FROM threats;
SELECT threat_id, threat_name FROM threats;
SELECT threat_name, threat_description FROM threats;
SELECT * FROM threat_targets;
SELECT target_id, target_name FROM threat_targets;
SELECT target_name, target_location FROM threat_targets;
SELECT * FROM security_events;
SELECT event_id, event_type FROM security_events;
SELECT event_type, event_timestamp FROM security_events;
SELECT * FROM security_actions;
SELECT action_id, action_type FROM security_actions;
SELECT action_type, action_description FROM security_actions;
SELECT t.threat_name, tt.target_name FROM threats t JOIN security_events se ON t.threat_id = se.threat_id JOIN threat_targets tt ON se.target_id = tt.target_id;
SELECT se.event_type, sa.action_type FROM security_events se JOIN security_actions sa ON se.event_id = sa.event_id;

SELECT t.threat_name, tt.target_name, sa.action_type FROM threats t JOIN security_events se ON t.threat_id = se.threat_id JOIN threat_targets tt ON se.target_id = tt.target_id JOIN security_actions sa ON se.event_id = sa.event_id;

SELECT t.threat_name, tt.target_name, se.event_type, sa.action_type FROM threats t JOIN security_events se ON t.threat_id = se.threat_id JOIN threat_targets tt ON se.target_id = tt.target_id JOIN security_actions sa ON se.event_id = sa.event_id;

SELECT t.threat_name, tt.target_name, se.event_timestamp, sa.action_description FROM threats t JOIN security_events se ON t.threat_id = se.threat_id JOIN threat_targets tt ON se.target_id = tt.target_id JOIN security_actions sa ON se.event_id = sa.event_id;

SELECT t.threat_name, se.event_type, se.event_timestamp, sa.action_type, sa.action_description FROM threats t JOIN security_events se ON t.threat_id = se.threat_id JOIN threat_targets tt ON se.target_id = tt.target_id JOIN security_actions sa ON se.event_id = sa.event_id;
SELECT * FROM threats;
SELECT threat_name, threat_description FROM threats WHERE threat_id = 1;
SELECT target_name, target_location FROM threat_targets WHERE target_id = 5;
SELECT * FROM security_events WHERE event_type = 'Data Breach';
SELECT * FROM security_events WHERE threat_id = 3 AND target_id = 2;
SELECT event_type, event_timestamp FROM security_events WHERE event_id = 10;
SELECT action_type, action_description FROM security_actions WHERE event_id = 8;
SELECT t.threat_name, s.event_type FROM threats t JOIN security_events s ON t.threat_id = s.threat_id;
SELECT t.target_name, a.action_type FROM threat_targets t JOIN security_actions a ON t.target_id = a.event_id;
SELECT t.threat_name, tt.target_name FROM threats t, threat_targets tt WHERE t.threat_id = tt.target_id;
SELECT * FROM threats WHERE threat_name LIKE '%Malware%';
SELECT * FROM threat_targets WHERE target_location LIKE '%California%';
SELECT * FROM security_events WHERE threat_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT * FROM threats WHERE threat_id BETWEEN 5 AND 10;
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM threats;
SELECT MAX(threat_id) FROM threats;
SELECT MIN(target_id) FROM threat_targets;
SELECT AVG(threat_id) FROM threats;
SELECT DISTINCT event_type FROM security_events;
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT target_id) FROM security_events;
SELECT * FROM threats;
SELECT threat_id, threat_name FROM threats;
SELECT threat_name, threat_level FROM threats;
SELECT * FROM threat_actors;
SELECT actor_id, actor_name FROM threat_actors;
SELECT actor_name, actor_type FROM threat_actors;
SELECT * FROM vulnerability;
SELECT vulnerability_id, vulnerability_name FROM vulnerability;
SELECT vulnerability_name, vulnerability_description FROM vulnerability;
SELECT * FROM attack_methods;
SELECT method_id, method_name FROM attack_methods;
SELECT method_name, method_description FROM attack_methods;
SELECT * FROM incidents;
SELECT incident_id, incident_date FROM incidents;
SELECT incident_description, threat_id FROM incidents;
SELECT incident_description, actor_id FROM incidents;
SELECT incident_description, vulnerability_id FROM incidents;
SELECT incident_description, method_id FROM incidents;
SELECT * FROM threats JOIN vulnerability ON threats.threat_id = vulnerability.threat_id;
SELECT * FROM threats JOIN incidents ON threats.threat_id = incidents.threat_id;
SELECT * FROM threats;
SELECT threat_id, threat_name FROM threats WHERE threat_level > 5;
SELECT * FROM threat_actors WHERE actor_type = 'Hacker';
SELECT incident_id, incident_date, incident_description FROM incidents WHERE actor_id = 3 AND method_id = 2;
SELECT threat_name, threat_description, vulnerability_name FROM threats JOIN vulnerability ON threats.threat_id = vulnerability.threat_id;
SELECT * FROM incidents ORDER BY incident_date DESC;
SELECT actor_id, actor_name, COUNT(*) AS num_incidents FROM incidents WHERE actor_id IS NOT NULL GROUP BY actor_id;
SELECT MAX(threat_level) AS highest_threat_level FROM threats;
SELECT actor_name, AVG(method_id) AS avg_attack_method FROM incidents JOIN threat_actors ON incidents.actor_id = threat_actors.actor_id GROUP BY actor_name;
SELECT DISTINCT threat_name FROM threats;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS num_incidents FROM incidents WHERE incident_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT * FROM threats WHERE threat_description LIKE '%ransomware%';
SELECT threat_id, threat_name FROM threats WHERE threat_level < (SELECT AVG(threat_level) FROM threats);
SELECT incident_id, incident_date, incident_description FROM incidents WHERE threat_id IN (SELECT threat_id FROM threats WHERE threat_level < 5);
SELECT actor_name, COUNT(*) AS num_incidents FROM incidents JOIN threat_actors ON incidents.actor_id = threat_actors.actor_id GROUP BY actor_name HAVING num_incidents > 3;
SELECT threat_name, COUNT(*) AS num_vulnerabilities FROM threats LEFT JOIN vulnerability ON threats.threat_id = vulnerability.threat_id GROUP BY threat_name;
SELECT * FROM incidents WHERE incident_description IS NULL;
SELECT actor_name, COUNT(*) AS num_incidents FROM incidents JOIN threat_actors ON incidents.actor_id = threat_actors.actor_id GROUP BY actor_name ORDER BY num_incidents DESC;
SELECT incident_date, COUNT(*) AS num_incidents FROM incidents GROUP BY incident_date HAVING COUNT(*) > 1;
SELECT threat_name, threat_description, vulnerability_name FROM threats JOIN vulnerability ON threats.threat_id = vulnerability.threat_id WHERE vulnerability_id IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM incidents WHERE incident_date = CURDATE();
